answers.answer: Absolutely he should go to the ER and as soon as possible (go to the heart hospital ER).  He is risking systemic infection which could be fatal and this wound on his abdomen needs urgent professional care.As far as diabetes, please work very hard to control his blood sugar as this will assist in healing and optimizing his immune system.Please let us know that you went to urgent care!

question: My husband is type 2, insulin dependent. 6-9 mos ago, he had open sores on one leg. They finally healed with topical treatments rec. by MD. Now he has a 2 inch open sore on lower abdomen. He says it is painful, turning black in center & red swollen around. It is in the fold of skin below belly. Should he be admitted to hospital? He is s/p heart grafts & stents over the last 13 yrs. If he should be admitted, I want to go to Heart Hospital ER. Local hospitals do not have "good" reputation.
title: 62 yr old type 2 with open sore- pain, red, discharge
